languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Ксенос{/g} в вычурном черном доспехе поворачивает к вам голову. Узкое бледное лицо испещрено татуировками и брызгами крови. Спустя мгновение тонкие губы растягиваются в кривой неприятной улыбке:{/n} "Наконец-то. Ты не спешил{mf||а} на встречу со мной, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g}". {n}У вас уходит пара секунд, чтобы осознать, что {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Толкователь{/g} молчит — ксенос обращается к вам на низком готике.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Ксенос{/g} в вычурном черном доспехе поворачивает к вам голову. Узкое бледное лицо испещрено татуировками и брызгами крови. Спустя несколько мгновений создание заговаривает:{/n} "Какая встреча. Я помню тебя, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g}". {n}У вас уходит пара секунд, чтобы осознать, что Толкователь молчит — ксенос обращается к вам на низком готике.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} in ornate black armour turns his head to you. His thin, pale face is covered in tattoos and blood spatters. After a moment, his thin lips stretch into a crooked, unpleasant smile.{/n} "At last. You took your time coming to meet me, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}." {n}A couple of seconds pass before you realise that the {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Elucidator{/g} is silent — the xenos is addressing you in Low Gothic.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Ксенос{/g} в вычурном черном доспехе поворачивает к вам голову. Узкое бледное лицо испещрено татуировками и брызгами крови. Спустя мгновение тонкие губы растягиваются в кривой неприятной улыбке:{/n} "Наконец-то. Ты не спешил{mf||а} на встречу со мной, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g}". {n}У вас уходит пара секунд, чтобы осознать, что {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Толкователь{/g} молчит — ксенос обращается к вам на низком готике.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} in ornate black armour turns his head to you. His thin, pale face is covered in tattoos and blood spatters. After a moment, his thin lips stretch into a crooked, unpleasant smile.{/n} "At last. You took your time coming to meet me, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}." {n}A couple of seconds pass before you realise that the Elucidator is silent — the xenos is addressing you in Low Gothic.{/n}

{n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} in ornate black armor turns his head to you. His thin, pale face is covered in tattoos and blood splatters. A few moments later, the creature speaks,{/n} "Well, well. I remember you, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}." {n}It takes a couple of seconds for you to realize that the Elucidator is silent — the xenos is addressing you in Low Gothic.{/n}

After a moment, his thin lips stretch into a crooked, unpleasant smile.{/n} "At last. You took your time coming to meet me, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}." {n}A couple of seconds pass before you realise that the Elucidator is silent — the xenos is addressing you in Low Gothic.{/n}

I remember you, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}." {n}It takes a couple of seconds for you to realize that the Elucidator is silent — the xenos is addressing you in Low Gothic.{/n}

You took your time coming to meet me, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}." {n}A couple of seconds pass before you realise that the Elucidator is silent — the xenos is addressing you in Low Gothic.{/n}

{n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} in ornate black armour turns his head to you. His thin, pale face is covered in tattoos and blood spatters. After a moment, his thin lips stretch into a crooked, unpleasant smile.{/n} "At last. You took your time coming to meet me, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}." {n}A couple of seconds pass before you realise that the {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Elucidator{/g} is silent — the xenos is addressing you in Low Gothic.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} de armadura negra ornamentada se gira hacia ti. Su pálido y esbelto rostro está cubierto de tatuajes y manchas de sangre. Al cabo de un momento, sus labios forman una sonrisa retorcida y desagradable.{/n} «Por fin. Has tardado en venir a verme, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}». {n}Al cabo de unos segundos, te das cuenta de que el {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Dilucidador{/g} guarda silencio. Este xenos se dirige a ti en Bajo Gótico.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} in ornate black armour turns his head to you. His thin, pale face is covered in tattoos and blood spatters. After a moment, his thin lips stretch into a crooked, unpleasant smile.{/n} "At last. You took your time coming to meet me, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}." {n}A couple of seconds pass before you realise that the {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Elucidator{/g} is silent — the xenos is addressing you in Low Gothic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} de armadura negra ornamentada se gira hacia ti. Su pálido y esbelto rostro está cubierto de tatuajes y manchas de sangre. Al cabo de un momento, sus labios forman una sonrisa retorcida y desagradable.{/n} «Por fin. Has tardado en venir a verme, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}». {n}Al cabo de unos segundos, te das cuenta de que el {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Dilucidador{/g} guarda silencio. Este xenos se dirige a ti en Bajo Gótico.{/n}

languages.text: {n}穿着华美黑色盔甲的{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}扭过头看着你，他瘦削、苍白的脸上布满了纹身与血迹。过了一会儿，他的薄唇舒展开来，露出了令人不快的扭曲笑容。{/n}“终于来了，你还真是不急着来见我啊，{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}。”{n}几秒钟过去了，你意识到{g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}阐释器{/g}并没有在运行——眼前的这只异形正在用低哥特语与你对话。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} in ornate black armour turns his head to you. His thin, pale face is covered in tattoos and blood spatters. After a moment, his thin lips stretch into a crooked, unpleasant smile.{/n} "At last. You took your time coming to meet me, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}." {n}A couple of seconds pass before you realise that the {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Elucidator{/g} is silent — the xenos is addressing you in Low Gothic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}穿着华美黑色盔甲的{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}扭过头看着你，他瘦削、苍白的脸上布满了纹身与血迹。过了一会儿，他的薄唇舒展开来，露出了令人不快的扭曲笑容。{/n}“终于来了，你还真是不急着来见我啊，{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}。”{n}几秒钟过去了，你意识到{g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}阐释器{/g}并没有在运行——眼前的这只异形正在用低哥特语与你对话。{/n}

languages.text: {n}装飾が施された黒い鎧に身を包んだ{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}がこちらへ振り返った。彼の皮膚の薄い、青白い顔は入れ墨と血しぶきに覆われている。しばらくすると、彼の薄い唇は歪んだ不愉快な笑みを見せた。{/n}「やっとか。ずいぶん遅かったな、{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}」{n}数秒後、{g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}エルシデイター{/g}が沈黙していることに気づいた。彼は下位帝国語で話しかけてきた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} in ornate black armour turns his head to you. His thin, pale face is covered in tattoos and blood spatters. After a moment, his thin lips stretch into a crooked, unpleasant smile.{/n} "At last. You took your time coming to meet me, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}." {n}A couple of seconds pass before you realise that the {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Elucidator{/g} is silent — the xenos is addressing you in Low Gothic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}装飾が施された黒い鎧に身を包んだ{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}がこちらへ振り返った。彼の皮膚の薄い、青白い顔は入れ墨と血しぶきに覆われている。しばらくすると、彼の薄い唇は歪んだ不愉快な笑みを見せた。{/n}「やっとか。ずいぶん遅かったな、{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}」{n}数秒後に{g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}エルシデイター{/g}が沈黙していることに気づいた――彼は下位帝国語で話しかけているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} in verzierter schwarzer Rüstung dreht dir seinen Kopf zu. Sein schmales, blasses Gesicht ist voller Tätowierungen und Blutspritzer. Einen Augenblick später verziehen seine dünnen Lippen sich zu einem schiefen, unangenehmen Lächeln.{/n} "Endlich. Ihr habt Euch Zeit gelassen, zu mir zu kommen, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g}." {n}Einige Sekunden vergehen, bis dir klar wird, dass der {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Elucidator{/g} schweigt – der Xenos hat dich auf Niedergotisch angesprochen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} in ornate black armour turns his head to you. His thin, pale face is covered in tattoos and blood spatters. After a moment, his thin lips stretch into a crooked, unpleasant smile.{/n} "At last. You took your time coming to meet me, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}." {n}A couple of seconds pass before you realise that the {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Elucidator{/g} is silent — the xenos is addressing you in Low Gothic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} in verzierter schwarzer Rüstung dreht dir seinen Kopf zu. Sein schmales, blasses Gesicht ist voller Tätowierungen und Blutspritzer. Einen Augenblick später verziehen seine dünnen Lippen sich zu einem schiefen, unangenehmen Lächeln.{/n} "Endlich. Ihr habt Euch Zeit gelassen, zu mir zu kommen, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g}." {n}Einige Sekunden vergehen, bis dir klar wird, dass der {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Elucidator{/g} schweigt – der Xenos hat dich auf Niedergotisch angesprochen.{/n}

languages.original_text: {n}The xenos in ornate black armour turns his head to you. His thin, pale face is covered in tattoos and blood spatters. After a moment, his thin lips stretch into a crooked, unpleasant smile.{/n} "At last. You took your time coming to meet me, mon-keigh." {n}A couple of seconds pass before you realise that the Elucidator is silent — the xenos is addressing you in Low Gothic.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} à l'armure noire ouvragée se tourne vers vous. Son visage fin et pâle est couvert de tatouages et de gouttes de sang. Au bout d'un moment, un rictus déplaisant étire ses lèvres minces.{/n} « Vous voilà enfin. Vous avez pris votre temps, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. » {n}Il vous faut quelques secondes pour réaliser que votre {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}élucidateur{/g} est silencieux. Le xénos s'adresse à vous en bas gothique.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} in ornate black armour turns his head to you. His thin, pale face is covered in tattoos and blood spatters. After a moment, his thin lips stretch into a crooked, unpleasant smile.{/n} "At last. You took your time coming to meet me, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}." {n}A couple of seconds pass before you realise that the {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Elucidator{/g} is silent — the xenos is addressing you in Low Gothic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} à l'armure noire ouvragée se tourne vers vous. Son visage fin et pâle est couvert de tatouages et de gouttes de sang. Au bout d'un moment, un rictus déplaisant étire ses lèvres minces.{/n} « Vous voilà enfin. Vous avez pris votre temps, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. » {n}Il vous faut quelques secondes pour réaliser que votre {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}élucidateur{/g} est silencieux. Le xénos s'adresse à vous en bas gothique.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Oymalı kara zırhlı {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno{/g}, kafasını sana doğru çeviriyor. Kemikli, soluk yüzü dövmelerle dolu ve kana bulanmış. Bir anda ince dudakları, yamuk ve huzursuz edici bir tebessümle kıvrılıveriyor.{/n} "Şükür. Sonunda tanışabildik {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}." {n}Birkaç saniye sonra {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Aydınlatıcı'nın{/g} sessizleştiğini fark ediyorsun. Zeno, seninle Adi Gotik dilinde konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} in ornate black armour turns his head to you. His thin, pale face is covered in tattoos and blood spatters. After a moment, his thin lips stretch into a crooked, unpleasant smile.{/n} "At last. You took your time coming to meet me, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}." {n}A couple of seconds pass before you realise that the {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Elucidator{/g} is silent — the xenos is addressing you in Low Gothic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Oymalı kara zırhlı {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno{/g}, kafasını sana doğru çeviriyor. Kemikli, soluk yüzü dövmelerle dolu ve kana bulanmış. Bir anda ince dudakları, yamuk ve huzursuz edici bir tebessümle kıvrılıveriyor.{/n} "Şükür. Sonunta tanışabildik {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}." {n}Birkaç saniye sonra {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Aydınlatıcı{/g}nın sessizleştiğini fark ediyorsun. Zeno, seninle Adi Gotik dilinde konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n}
